name: Project Amepe
tagline: Amepe, what is it? Not much
body:
# Project Amepe, Client / Server software
Nature of making this is about me to learn Java programming language. So naturally code is not probably quite good.

## What to expect from this now (2014-8-15)
* Client & Server Software
* Not yet useful for anything
* Not ready

## Future
* Server uses database to store data, feat. MySql
* Easy to create and add own module, example: Person Information Manager (PIM)
* All kinds of modules, PIM, CIM and so on...
* Drag'n'Drop ability, from module to another
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
